turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'd like to order a drink from the Starbucks on Spruce Street in Philadelphia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I'd like to get a venti caffè latte with soy milk, please. And I'd love the whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, you said venti caffe latte with soy milk and whipped cream, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me send your order to the starbucks on spruce street, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a venti caffe latte with soy milk and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on spruce street, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
